program_name: New Zealand Screen Production Rebate - International Productions

qpe_definition.special_rules: Qualifying New Zealand Production Expenditure (QNZPE) includes expenditure incurred in New Zealand. Enhanced 5% uplift available for projects meeting additional criteria (previously required PDV-heavy projects, now simplified). Eligible for international productions with at least 80% foreign financing.

spv_requirements: Applicant must be the production company responsible for the production. New Zealand service company typically applies on behalf of foreign producer.
notes: NZSPR for international productions offers 20% base rebate, with potential 25% for projects meeting enhanced criteria. Minimum NZD $15 million in QNZPE required (approximately USD $9M). Updated July 2023 to simplify the 5% uplift eligibility - previously complex PDV threshold, now more accessible. International animation projects fully eligible. New Zealand renowned for high-quality VFX and animation work (Weta Digital, now Weta FX). The 20-25% rebate is competitive for high-budget international animations requiring world-class post/VFX. Cash-based rebate, not tax offset. Administered by New Zealand Film Commission. Processing ~6 months. Can be attractive for animations with significant CGI/VFX component. Updates to criteria effective July 1, 2025 continue to support international production attraction.
